data.instruction: This is a cognitive test, called SKT, to evaluate your cognitive abilities
The goal is to sort the tokens in ascending order on the board
Please wait for my instructions to move a token
data.LEV_0: "It's your turn, please move a token"
data.LEV_1: "Come on.... I know you can do it"
"Remember, The numbers have to be sorted in ascending order"
"Dont be afraid to make a mistake... Do it!!"
data.LEV_2: "I'm here to help you ... The solution can be one of those:"
"Why do not try with one of those:"
data.LEV_3: "It's not so difficult.... the right token to move is.."
data.LEV_4: "The token to move is this one..."
"Take it ... and move in the right location"
data.help: "Do you need help? Say YES or NO"
data.help_timeout: "No worries, I will do something for you"
data.time_out: "Time is passing I will provide you assistance again"
data.max_attempt: "You've reached the maximum number of attempts, I will move the token for you"
data.compassion: "People say lucky in love unlucky in gaming"
"Dont worry I'm sure you will get better"
"I know how you feel, I've been in this situation before"
data.congratulation: "Well done, you're playing as I expected"
data.end_game: "It has been a pleasure playing with you, hope you've enjoyed too"
